      • update

        void update(java.lang.String table_name,
            java.lang.String[] values,
            java.lang.String where_condition,
            java.lang.String[] where_args)
        Updates an entry (or multiple entries) in the edu.wpi.cs3733d18.teamS.database.
        Parameters:
        table_name - the name of the table.
        values - the new values to insert.
        where_condition - optional argument that restricts the query (e.g. "node_id = ?"); default null.
        where_args - optional arguments to replace "?" in the condition (similar to Android); default null.

      • delete

        void delete(java.lang.String table_name,

            java.lang.String[] where_args)
        Removes an entry from the table with the given name.
        Parameters:
        table_name - the name of the table.
        where_condition - optional argument that restricts the query (e.g. "node_id = ?"); default null.
        where_args - optional arguments to replace "?" in the condition (similar to Android); default null.
